summary: AI Engineer with over 5 years of experience in driving technological advancements and enhancing product capabilities in the SaaS and insurance sectors. Achieved 70% sales growth in FinTech and pioneered GenAI solutions for legal efficiency.

bullets.text: Led AI initiatives resulting in a 15% increase in product efficiency.
Developed AI solutions that expanded market reach by 20%.
Collaborated across teams to define AI strategies, reducing integration time by 30%.
Created an online insurance tool eliminating medical examinations, increasing user adoption by 25%.
Integrated technology to enhance user experience, reducing processing time by 40%.
Contributed to platform development, personalizing insurance plans on web/mobile, resulting in a 30% increase in customer satisfaction.
Built full-stack apps using React, React Native, and Node.js, enhancing user engagement by 20%.
Engaged in UI design, translating client visions into functional interfaces, improving client satisfaction by 15%.
Published multiple apps on stores, optimizing performance and engagement, achieving over 10,000 downloads.
